summary: Enables the player character's alchemy skill and perks, to affect the duration of most beneficial effects of potions and reduce potion spamming.
descriptionHtml:
This mod's purpose, is to enable the player character's alchemy skill and perks, to affect the duration of most beneficial effects of potions and reduce potion spamming.

For example:

With this mod active, Alchemy of level 100 and Alchemist 5/5, you will be able to create:

-[u][b]12 min[/b][/u] potions that fortify [b][i]Carry Weight, Health & Health Regen, Magicka & Magicka Regen, Stamina & Stamina Regen, Heavy Armor, Light Armor, Block, One-Handed, Two-Handed, Archery, Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction, Illusion, Restoration & Sneak.[/i][/b]

-[u][b]12 min[/b][/u] potions of [b][i]Fire, Frost, Shock, Poison & Magic Resistance[/i][/b] and finally,

-[u][b]6 min[/b][/u] potions that fortify [b][i]Barter, Persuasion, Pickpocket, Lockpicking, Smithing & Enchanting.[/i][/b]

Benefactor increases durations by a further 25%. Also, any subsequent fortify alchemy enchant, will increase them accordingly.

Durations of [b][i]Invisibility & Waterbreathing[/i][/b] have also been slightly tweaked. Also, extra care has been taken to make sure looted or purchased potions durations conform to the change as best as possible, without their prices deviating too much from stock Skyrim values. Detrimental effects (poisons) have been left untouched.

Compatibility:

Compatibility patches are available for [b]Dawnguard, Hearthfires, Dragonborn, Moonpath & Wyrmstooth[/b]. [b]Falskaar[/b] doesn't seem to need one.

Incompatibility:

This mod will most likely create a mess, when used with overhauls like SkyRe & Requiem.


[u][i]Important: Potions you've crafted before installing and activating this mod, will not be affected -only the ones you craft afterwards.[/i][/u]
author: Atkara

files.name: SCPD - Dawnguard
files.changelogHtml: Complete Rework. From now on, duration of potions will be determined by Alchemy Skill, it's perks and any relevant enchants.
